description: From square root of Riemann zeta function: form Dirichlet series Sum b_n/n^s whose square is zeta function; sequence gives numerator of b_n.
comments: A046643(n)/A046644(n) is multiplicative with a(p^e) = (2n-1)!!/2^n/n!. Dirichlet g.f. of A046643(n)/A046644(n) is sqrt(zeta(x)). - _Christian G. Bower_, May 16 2005
maple: b := proc(n) option remember; local c,i,t1; if n = 1 then 1 else c := 1; t1 := divisors(n);for i from 2 to nops(t1)-1 do c := c-b(t1[ i ])*b(n/t1[ i ]); od; c/2; fi; end;
mathematica: b[1] = 1; b[n_] := b[n] = (dn = Divisors[n]; c = 1;Do[c = c - b[dn[[i]]]*b[n/dn[[i]]], {i, 2, Length[dn] - 1}]; c/2); a[n_] := Numerator[b[n]]; a /@ Range[90] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Apr 04 2011, after Maple version *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
